description: Try our easy to follow Poached Peaches with Vanilla & Mint recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Poached Peaches with Vanilla & Mint Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, used to make 2 strips of zest

recipeInstructions.text: Cut an 'X' through the skin at the base of each peach with a knife. Combine 3 cups water, sugar, zest and mint in a saucepan. split vanilla bean and scrape seeds into the pan. Stir over medium heat for about 3 minutes until sugar has dissolved.

Add peaches to syrup. Bring to a gentle simmer, and cook, turning occasionally, until peaches are tender. Use a skewer to test fruit after about 8 minutes (the cooking time will vary, depending on the ripeness of the peaches you use).
Transfer fruit to a bowl and set aside to cool. Return pan to heat. Boil for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, using a small knife, peel skin from peaches. Halve and remove stones. Place 2 halves into each serving bowl and drizzle with some of the syrup. Garnish with mint. Serve with yoghurt.
